text: Emerald Isle is a small town on the coast of North Carolina, United States. Emerald Isle is a beach town. About 50,000 people come every summer. Emerald Isle became a town in 1953. ==Other websites== * Official Emerald Isle, NC website ==References== Category:Carteret County, North Carolina Category:Towns in North Carolina Category:Beaches of the United States Category:1953 establishments in the United States Category:1950s establishments in North Carolina
title: Emerald Isle, North Carolina
